title: Follow @ClickForAfrica on X
shortDescription: Follow our X account to stay updated
instructions:
1. Click the Visit button to open X/Twitter
2. Click the Follow button on our profile
3. Return here and click Complete when done

title: Subscribe to ClickForCharity on YouTube
instructions:
1. Click Visit to open our YouTube channel
2. Click the Subscribe button
3. Return here and click Complete

title: Follow us on Odysee
instructions:
1. Visit our Odysee channel
2. Click Follow
3. Return and mark complete

title: Like our latest post
shortDescription: Like our most recent X post
instructions:
1. Visit the post
2. Click the heart/like button
3. Return and complete the task

title: Like our charity video
shortDescription: Give a thumbs up to our latest video
instructions:
1. Watch at least 30 seconds of the video
2. Click the thumbs up button
3. Return and complete

title: Create Publish0x account
shortDescription: Sign up for Publish0x blogging platform
instructions:
1. Visit Publish0x
2. Click Sign Up
3. Complete registration with email
4. Verify your email
5. Return and mark complete

title: Join Odysee
instructions:
1. Visit Odysee.com
2. Click Sign Up
3. Create account with email or wallet
4. Verify your email
5. Complete your profile
6. Return and mark complete
